English: I want to go to the park.
Can you tell me the way to the museum?
French: Peux-tu me dire le chemin pour le musée ?

English: My house is located on the corner of 5th Avenue and Main Street.
French: Ma maison est située au coin de la 5ème avenue et de la rue Principale.

English: The bank is located across from the post office.
French: La banque est située face à la poste.
